Transaction State Context.Guessing State: When users lock in a guess using the lockInGuess function.
Transaction State Context.Settlement State: When users attempt to settle their guess using the settle function.

External Interactions.Description: The contract interacts with block data and transfers Ether to users based on their predictions.
Details: The contract accepts a 1 Ether deposit when a guess is locked in.
If a user's guess is correct, 2 Ether is transferred back to the user.
